name: Psycho Love Demo
detailed_description:
In this demo of the game "Psycho Love" you will be given the opportunity to experience the game before its release. In your hands, it will be available to the full storyline of one of the heroines, as well as a good and bad ending to this storyline. This storyline will go for 9 hours of gameplay.
Lonely all his life a guy named Sergei Ustinov learns that he has schizophrenia. He goes to a mental hospital called Phoenix. This dispensary specializes in creating a favorable lifestyle for patients. The main problem of the majority of patients whose age coincides with the age of Sergei is loneliness. He gets acquainted with many people, but he gives preference to only one (in this demo). Sabine Glossa.
 This is what he writes in his diary about this girl: “Sabina Glyantseva is the most mysterious girl I've ever seen in this place. She never will be good enough to talk. She loves being asked about something, but at the same time the information needs to be pulled out of it. I would even say that she doesn’t feel any emotions at all! She always walks with the same facial expression, answers any question or request with a meek answer. it never eats anything! I can not even suspect what diagnosis it has. "

 Get closer to her, go through all the difficulties of life, and they will have to overcome themselves in this demo.

short_description: When Sergei finds out that he has schizophrenia, he gets into the Phoenix dispensary. He meets many people who can stifle his loneliness, but fate brings him only with one. Sabina Glyantseva, a girl from this world. She attracted Sergey with her mystery and detachment from the world.
